properties.name: ADCBR13
properties.notes: This site lies within the Shoreham Harbour Regeneration Area identified as a broad location for change. The regeneration of Shoreham Harbour has been a long term aspiration and and the redevelopment of the Western Harbour Arm is recognised as a priority for the Shoreham Harbour Partnership. The principle of redeveloping this site for a residential use is consistent with Joint Area Action Plan policies.. SHLAA Ref: SH/001/13
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: ADCBR14
properties.notes: This site lies within the Shoreham Harbour Regeneration Area identified as a broad location for change in the Adur Local Plan 2017. The regeneration of Shoreham Harbour has been a long term aspiration and the redevelopment of the Western Harbour Arm is recognised as a priority for the Shoreham Harbour Partnership.. Redevelopment of the site to provide ten buildings, containing 540 new homes (of which two will be studios, 179 x one bed, 323 x two bed and 38 x three bed). Planning Ref: AWDM/1497/17
